subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Milwaukee’s Michael Redd scored 52 points yesterday, but he was overshadowed by Chicago’s Ben Gordon, who scored 48 to lead the visiting Bulls past the Bucks, 126-121, in overtime.
snippet: Milwaukee’s Michael Redd scored 52 points yesterday, but he was overshadowed by Chicago’s Ben Gordon, who scored 48 to lead the visiting Bulls past the Bucks, 126-121, in overtime.
